skip.description: Allows user to skip the response area

autoSubmit.description: Go straight to next page once this page is complete

autoBegin.description: Go straight into exam, without having to press the 'Begin' button

keypadDelay.description: Number of milliseconds to wait before activating the keypad

feedback.description: Shows the user which digits were correct after each set of digits is entered

feedbackDelay.description: Number of milliseconds to show the digits after the presentation before clearing the keypad. This field can be used even when `feedback` is set to `false`

examInstructions.description: Replaces the top-level instruction text on the CHA exam pages (each page after starting page)

measureBackground.description: Select a method from the list below to measure background noise after an audiometry exam

exportToCSV.description: Whether result should be exported to CSV upon submitting exam results.

warmupN.description: Number of presentations during the warmup period

warmupMasker.description: Type of Masker Material used during the warmup period. Only valid for maskerType = Schroeder

initialSNR.description: Signal to Noise Ratio of the first presentation

fixedLevel.description: Level of either the target or the masker, whichever is fixed, in dB SPL

fixedMaterial.description: Defines whether the “target” or the “masker” is presented at fixed level (the other is adjusted to get the desired SNR)

correctStep.description: SNR step size for each correct digit in the previous response

incorrectStep.description: SNR step size for each incorrect digit in the previous response

warmupCorrectStep.description: SNR step size for each correct digit in the previous response (using the warmupMasker masker type) during the 'warmup' period

warmupIncorrectStep.description: SNR step size for each incorrect digit in the previous response (using the warmupMasker masker type) during the 'warmup' period

ear.description: which ear to use for the output
